comment.author: 36330824621@N01
comment._content: This is probably Lago Lucchetti because it's next to the village of Duey, where Delano photographed that same month. CORRECTION: See comment below identifying this as Guanica Bay.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content:
RicanGeek:

Thanks for the information!  We’ll look into it.

comment.author: 36330824621@N01
comment._content: Whoever tagged this Bahia Guanica is correct! This is not Lago Lucchetti, because the Caribbean Ocean can be seen in the horizon and Lago Lucchetti is not adjacent to it. I've estimated the location where this picture was taken and added geotags considering the location of the buildings as the town of Guanica and the angle facing the ocean.

comment.author: 11592485@N04
comment._content: In my opinion, from a Guaniqueño, this is not Guanica. The whole town configuration is wrong and the bay and Ensenada bay are not these.  Someone needs to check to see where this is exactly but it is not Guanica.
comment.authorname: ARCHIVO HISTORICO Y FOTOGRAFICO DE PUERTO RICO
